## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All activated Invariants MUST be satisfied.
- [ ] All scope IDs listed in the pull request file MUST be satisfied.

## Checklist

- [ ] spec/state.yaml MUST be updated to the active phase number.
- [ ] node scripts/check MUST exit with code 0.
- [ ] Evidence Artifacts under artifacts/gates MUST be present for every activated Invariant.

## Simulated Role Reviews

### Product review

Findings:
- Findings bullets MUST describe user impact and scope compliance.

Changes made:
- Changes made bullets MUST list concrete edits with file paths.

Evidence pointers:
- Evidence pointers bullets MUST reference artifacts/gates file paths and command outputs.

Findings:
